events.name: Hadoopy Birthday: Hadoop Turns 10. Doug Cutting, Father of Hadoop in SG!
events.description: Doug Cutting, the inventor of Hadoop, will be visiting Singapore and BigData/HadoopSG will be hosting him for a "Hadoopy Birthday" party to celebrate Hadoop's ten year anniversary. We will be joining their group for the event. Doug Cutting: Ten Years of Hadoop Doug will delve into why and how he created Hadoop as well as the impact has on the world from a technological and business standpoint. He will also deliberate on where he thinks Hadoop will go. Things We Wish We Knew Before Operationalising Kafka (Data Engineering Team @ Lazada) by Sreekanth Ramakrishnan Apache Kafka, has become one of the center pieces of most of enterprise big data stacks. We will be talking about things which we have learnt while getting our Kafka cluster production ready. We will also be talking about what happens in a Kafka cluster when things go wrong, data loss scenarios, things to watch out when you deploy Apache Kafka. Beverages and snacks to be served.
events.location: Microsoft Operations Pte Ltd, ,                             1 Marina Boulevard, Level 21, Auditorium Room, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore, 018989
events.group_name: Singapore Data Insights for Business Forum
